name: flowooh
description: a light-weight extensible workflow based on Nodejs
author: iHeyTang

scripts.link:all: npm run link:core && npm run link:data
scripts.link:core: cd packages/flowooh-core && npm install && npm link
scripts.link:data: cd packages/flowooh-data && npm install && npm link
scripts.publish: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --no-private --exact -m "chore(@flowooh): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:beta: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=beta --no-private -m "chore(@flowooh): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:next: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=next --no-private --skip-git -m "chore(@flowooh): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:rc: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --npm-tag=rc --no-private -m "chore(@flowooh): publish %s release"
scripts.publish:test: npm run prerelease && npm run build:prod && ./node_modules/.bin/lerna publish --force-publish --no-private --npm-tag=test --skip-git -m "chore(@flowooh): publish %s release"
